backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining company/role management, personnel, tasks, and announcements with access control integration, data storage maps, and authorization helper functions for multi-tenant ERP system.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three authentication flow fixes for CompanyLogin, ManagerLogin, and EmployeeLogin components to trigger Internet Identity authentication windows.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of frontend files describing login pages, authentication hooks, routing, and styling with OKLCH color tokens for Turkish ERP interface.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based design tokens defining light and dark mode color schemes using warm neutral and amber tones for the ERP interface.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the ERP application with Turkish title and root div mounting point for React.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for login pages, role-based dashboards (owner/manager/employee), and module pages (personnel, tasks, announcements, reports).
frontend/src/components/CompanyRegistrat: Company registration form component allowing owners to register new companies with ID, name, and owner details, then saving user profile and navigating to owner dashboard.
frontend/src/components/Layout/Dashboard: Dashboard layout wrapper component rendering Header, Sidebar, and main content outlet with gradient background styling.
frontend/src/components/Layout/Header.ts: Header component displaying ERP branding, user profile with role badge, and logout button that clears authentication and query cache.
frontend/src/components/Layout/Sidebar.t: Renders a role-based navigation sidebar with different menu items for Owner, Manager, and Employee roles, using active route highlighting and permission-based visibility.
frontend/src/components/PermissionGate.t: A simple wrapper component that conditionally renders children based on a permission boolean, with optional fallback content.
frontend/src/components/RoleBadge.tsx: Displays a styled badge component showing user role (Owner/Manager/Employee) with role-specific colors in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Displays a styled badge for task status (Pending/In Progress/Completed) with status-specific colors in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRedirect.ts: Redirects authenticated users to their role-specific dashboard (owner/manager/employee) based on their user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking for the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend API operations including user profiles, company registration, invites, personnel management, tasks, and announcements.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserPermissions.ts: Extracts and exposes granular module permissions (personnel, task, announcement, report) from the current user profile as boolean flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors using an amber/brown color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementManagemen: Announcement management page allowing users to view, create, and delete announcements with role-based targeting. Includes permission checks and a dialog form for adding new announcements.
frontend/src/pages/CompanyLogin.tsx: Company owner login page using Internet Identity authentication. Redirects owners to their dashboard or shows registration form for new users, with role validation.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeDashboard.tsx: Employee dashboard displaying navigation cards for tasks, announcements, and reports based on user permissions. Validates employee role before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeLogin.tsx: Employee login page with Internet Identity authentication and invite code redemption form for new employees. Validates employee role and handles invite code submission.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeManagement.ts: Personnel management page for managers and owners to view employee lists and generate invite codes. Includes a dialog for creating 7-day valid invite codes with copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LoginSelection.tsx: Landing page that displays three login options (Company, Manager, Employee) as cards with icons and navigation buttons to their respective login pages.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Manager role dashboard that displays navigation cards for managing employees, tasks, announcements, and reports based on user permissions.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerLogin.tsx: Manager login page with Internet Identity authentication and invite code form for new managers to join a company.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerManagement.tsx: Owner-only page for managing company managers, displaying a list of managers and providing functionality to generate invite codes for new managers.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboard.tsx: Company owner dashboard with navigation cards to manage company managers, view reports, and access all personnel.
frontend/src/pages/PersonnelManagement.t: Personnel list page displaying all company employees in a table with name, role, and active status, accessible to users with personnel view permissions.
frontend/src/pages/ReportingModule.tsx: React component for the Reporting Module that displays three tabbed reports (Personnel Activity, Task Completion, Performance Summary) with role-based access control and navigation back to role-specific dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/TaskManagement.tsx: React component for Task Management that allows users with taskView permission to view, add, update, and delete tasks with assignees, priorities, dates, and status tracking using a table and dialog interface.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings for borders/shadows/animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a Turkish multi-tenant ERP system with Internet Identity authentication, three-tier role hierarchy, module-based RBAC, and a known issue with authentication not triggering on login screens.
